title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions:
The student response includes none of these criteria.

  • Identifies angle as any of 5π 4 +2πn MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4094@

  • Geometric description that recognizes a counterclockwise rotation

The student response includes one of these criteria.

  • Identifies angle as any of 5π 4 +2πn MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4094@

  • Geometric description that recognizes a counterclockwise rotation

The student response includes both of these criteria.

  • Identifies angle as any of 5π 4 +2πn MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4094@

  • Geometric description
